News

Suffolk Libraries recommends YA titles to mark LGBT History Month 2019

Written by Hannah Foulstone · Published Feb 1, 2019

This LGBT History Month, we have added lots of great new titles to our Young Adult LGBT recommendation list.

Suffolk Libraries celebrates Harry Potter Book Night

Written by Hannah Foulstone · Published Feb 1, 2019

Several libraries across Suffolk are hosting Harry Potter events in February to celebrate J. K. Rowling's bestselling books.

Leiston residents invited to have their say about their library

Written by Alice Violett · Published Jan 30, 2019

Leiston Library are asking local people how they use the library.

Suffolk's newest library is opening soon!

Written by James Powell · Published Jan 16, 2019

The new Eye Library is due to open its doors for the first time next week - at 2pm on Thursday 24 January.

Suffolk Libraries teams up with Macmillan Cancer Support to provide leaflets in libraries and as eBooks

Written by James Powell · Published Dec 21, 2018

Suffolk Libraries has recently been working with Macmillan Cancer Support to provide new and updated information leaflets about a range of cancer related issues from our libraries.

Chantry Library's Christmas cracker

Written by James Powell · Published Dec 21, 2018

Chantry Library recently held a festive celebration for the local community with a special Christmas dinner and two Christmas Carol events.

Lesley’s Readers on BBC Radio Suffolk – book choice for January 2019

Written by Alice Violett · Published Dec 20, 2018

This month Lesley will be discussing Christmas at the Beach Hut, by Veronica Henry.

Pop-up library in Rushmere reaches double milestone

Written by James Powell · Published Dec 7, 2018

A pop-up library run by Suffolk Libraries has recently celebrated its 1,000th visit and issued its 1,000th book.

New patron for Ixworth Library

Written by James Powell · Published Dec 4, 2018

The Friends of Ixworth Library are delighted to announce that Lady Carlisle has agreed to become a patron of the library.

New Eye Library opening date confirmed for Thursday 24 January 2019

Written by James Powell · Published Nov 26, 2018

The date for the opening of the new library in Eye has been confirmed as Thursday 24 January 2019. The current library will close for the last time on Sunday 13 January 2019.
